result.eng: Put the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.
result.ga: Cuir an litir sa phost le do thoil
result.orig: Cuir an litir sa phost le do thoil
result.html: Cuir an litir sa phost le do thoilPut the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.
result.ponchtml: Cuir an litir sa ṗost le do ṫoilPut the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.

result.html: Cá bhfuil oifig an phoistWhere is the post office?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil oifig an ṗoistWhere is the post office?

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ga: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.orig: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.html: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig an post isteaċ um 7 45 gaċ maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.

result.eng: We got a package in the post.
result.html: Tháinig beart sa phostWe got a package in the post.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig beart sa ṗostWe got a package in the post.

result.eng: The post office is on the left.
result.ga: Tá oifig an phoist ar chlé
result.orig: Tá oifig an phoist ar chlé
result.html: Tá oifig an phoist ar chléThe post office is on the left.
result.ponchtml: Tá oifig an ṗoist ar ċléThe post office is on the left.

result.eng: There are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna den chéad scoth ann Tá siopaí maithe ann oifig an phoist scoileanna banc agus linn snámha

result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna den ċéad scoṫ ann Tá siopaí maiṫe ann oifig an ṗoist scoileanna banc agus linn snáṁaThere are excellent facilities there. There are good shops there, a post office, schools, a bank and a swimming pool.
